name: Scaling & Whitening
text: Teeth Scaling & whitening is a procedure that is performed on a regular basis. Scaling goes considerably deeper than a conventional cleaning, which only deals with the surface of the tooth. Teeth whitening involves strong whitening agents being applied onto your teeth. The rest of your mouth, including your gums, is protected from the whitening materials.

name: Dental Filling
text: Dental Filling is a way to replace the decayed/damaged tooth structure and restore it back to its normal function and strength. One does not suit all! The dentist, according to the clinical situation, will choose whatâ€™s best for you. Depending on your teeth condition, you will be suggested one of the following materials like glass lonomer or composite material.

name: Dental Implants
text: Dental implants are permanently placed in the mouth to replace missing teeth (either congenitally or due to disease) and hence look, function and feel like natural teeth.
